original: gang la brgyud nas don la skye ba nyid du bsam pa /
analyzed: gang la brgyud nas don la skye ba nyid du bsam pa /
translated: But if it is thought that it arises from an object indirectly,

original: 'di ni brtag pa'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i rtogs pa ma yin no //🔽gal te med pa'i shes pa la 'jug pas dngos po med pa thob pa mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni brtag pa'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i rtogs pa ma yin no // gal te med pa'i shes pa la 'jug pas dngos po med pa thob pa mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: then it is not a cognition that comes about through conceptualization.

original: dngos med logs shig pa la ni //
analyzed: dngos med logs shig pa la ni //
translated: But isn’t it seen that the cognition of non-existence is non-deceptive because it obtains the non-existence of an entity?

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: It is said:🔽There is no obtaining of non-existence apart from an entity.

original: sa phyogs las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa thob pa ni med kyi /
analyzed: sa phyogs las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa thob pa ni med kyi /
translated: There is no obtaining of non-existence apart from a place, but

original: 'on kyang sa phyogs tsam thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'on kyang sa phyogs tsam thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: it is said that one obtains just the place.🔽This is what is meant.

original: de nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: It is said:

original: mi slu 'ba' zhig pa la yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi slu 'ba' zhig pa la yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is only non-deceptive.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni 'ba' zhig pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni 'ba' zhig pa'o //
translated: The word only means alone.

original: 'di la dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i skyes bu'i byed pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i skyes bu'i byed pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no operation of a person who has a valid cognition of non-existence.

original: gal te 'ba' zhig tu 'dzin pa dngos po med pa rtogs pa med na mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig tu 'dzin pa dngos po med pa rtogs pa med na mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: If the apprehension of only does not exist, is the realization of non-existence not impossible?

original: des na mngon sum gyi dngos po 'dzin pa'i dus su 'ba' zhig par 'dzin pa nyid dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyi dngos po 'dzin pa'i dus su 'ba' zhig par 'dzin pa nyid dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, at the time of apprehending the object of direct perception, the apprehension of only is the result of the valid cognition of non-existence.

original: dngos med blo ni med par nges //
analyzed: dngos med blo ni med par nges //
translated: The cognition of non-existence is ascertained as non-existent.

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: This is stated.

original: sa phyogs 'ba' zhig rtogs pa na //
analyzed: sa phyogs 'ba' zhig rtogs pa na //
translated: When the mere place is realized,

original: dbyug pa can la dbyug pa ltar //
analyzed: dbyug pa can la dbyug pa ltar //
translated: like a stick in a stick-holder,

original: khyad par du gyur pa'i dngos po med pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig kyang rtogs pa med pa ni med do //
analyzed: khyad par du gyur pa'i dngos po med pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig kyang rtogs pa med pa ni med do //
translated: there is no realization of any so-called special non-existence.

original: 'o na 'ba' zhig tu 'dzin pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /🔽gzhan dang 'dre ba med par ni //
analyzed: 'o na 'ba' zhig tu 'dzin pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / gzhan dang 'dre ba med par ni //
translated: If it is asked, How does it become the apprehension of only?

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: It is stated, Without mixing with others.

original: ji srid du gzhan gyi rang bzhin dang ma 'brel par snang ba de tsam nyid kyis 'ba' zhig par 'dzin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ji srid du gzhan gyi rang bzhin dang ma 'brel par snang ba de tsam nyid kyis 'ba' zhig par 'dzin pa yin gyi /
translated: As long as it appears without the nature of another, it is apprehended as a bare particular.

original: 'dir khyad par lhag pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir khyad par lhag pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not depend on any other special feature.

original: des na mngon sum gyi 'ba' zhig pa gang yin pa'am /🔽'ba' zhig 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi mngon sum la mi slu ba yin gyi /
analyzed: des na mngon sum gyi 'ba' zhig pa gang yin pa'am / 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi mngon sum la mi slu ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, whatever is a bare perception,🔽or a perception that has the nature of apprehending a bare particular, is nondeceptive.

original: dngos po med pa'am de 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'am de 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a nonentity or the apprehension of a bare particular.🔽Therefore, that is

original: de'i phyir de ni zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: is a summary.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa gzhan la mi slu ba med pa'i gtan tshigs de'i phyir rtogs pa po ma rmongs pa la ltos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po med pa gzhan la mi slu ba med pa'i gtan tshigs de'i phyir rtogs pa po ma rmongs pa la ltos te /
translated: Since there is no nondeceptive evidence for a nonentity, in dependence on the nondisoriented cognizer,

original: 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa de ni mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa de ni mngon sum nyid do //
translated: that apprehension of a bare particular is perception.

original: gal te 'o na rmongs pas de ltar tha snyad @220a * //
analyzed: gal te 'o na rmongs pas de ltar tha snyad @220a * //
translated: If, due to confusion, one does not make such a convention,

original: mi byed pa de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i go skabs ci ste med ce na /
analyzed: mi byed pa de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i go skabs ci ste med ce na /
translated: then why is there no opportunity for a valid cognition of a nonentity?

original: de lta min na ni dmigs pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: de lta min na ni dmigs pa zhes smos so //
translated: If it were not so, then the word “only” would not be mentioned.

original: rtog pa po rmongs pa la ltos nas ni 'ba' zhig par 'dzin pa rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid tha snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtog pa po rmongs pa la ltos nas ni 'ba' zhig par 'dzin pa rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid tha snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In relation to the deluded thinker, the apprehension of “only” is the non-apprehension of the appearance of the nature of inference, which is the means of establishing the conventional.

original: gal te dngos med ces bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: gal te dngos med ces bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: If it is said that “non-entity” is the other,

original: sa phyogs gang yin pa de thams cad 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sa phyogs gang yin pa de thams cad 'ba' zhig pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: then not all of the place is “only,”

original: 'on kyang khyad par can yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang khyad par can yin no //
translated: but rather it is qualified.

original: khyad par de yang dngos po med pa las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par de yang dngos po med pa las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: And that qualification is not other than the non-entity.

original: de lta ma yin na bum pa dang bcas pa yang 'ba' zhig yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bum pa dang bcas pa yang 'ba' zhig yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then that which is together with the pot would also be “only.”

original: des na dngos po med pa rig pa med na 'ba' zhig tu ga las 'dzin /
analyzed: des na dngos po med pa rig pa med na 'ba' zhig tu ga las 'dzin /
translated: Therefore, if the non-entity is not cognized, how can “only” be apprehended?

original: dngos po med pa la yang mngon sum gyi byed pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po med pa la yang mngon sum gyi byed pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: And because there is no function of direct perception in regard to the non-entity,

original: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma grub pa yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma grub pa yin no snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: the valid cognition of the non-entity is established.

original: zlog pa la yang na tshungs  so zhes lan smras pa ni /
analyzed: zlog pa la yang na tshungs  so zhes lan smras pa ni /
translated: The response to the reversal is:

original: de yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “That also is not so.”

original: dngos po med par rig pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med par rig pa'o //
translated: It is understood that there is no entity.

original: 'brel pa rtogs na dngos po med pa'i phyir phan tshun bsten pa yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa rtogs na dngos po med pa'i phyir phan tshun bsten pa yin te /
translated: If the relation is understood, then there is mutual dependence because of the nonexistence of the entity.

original: rang dbang du dngos po med pa rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dbang du dngos po med pa rtog pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nonexistence of the entity is not independent, because the conception is refuted.

original: nyes pa gzhan yang smras pa ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //🔽gang rtogs pa'i stobs kyis phyogs 'ba' zhig par rtogs par bya ba dngos po med pa de nyid ma 'brel par rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan yang smras pa ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'o // gang rtogs pa'i stobs kyis phyogs 'ba' zhig par rtogs par bya ba dngos po med pa de nyid ma 'brel par rtogs pa'am /
translated: Another fault is stated:🔽If that nonexistence of the entity which is to be understood by the power of the conception is understood as unrelated or related, it is the cause of the understanding of the mere.

original: 'brel par rtogs pa zhig 'ba' zhig par rtogs pa'i rgyu yin na phyogs phyi ma la ni /
analyzed: 'brel par rtogs pa zhig 'ba' zhig par rtogs pa'i rgyu yin na phyogs phyi ma la ni /
translated: But in the latter case,

original: sa phyogs dang yang 'brel bar rtogs pa'i phyir dngos po med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa phyogs dang yang 'brel bar rtogs pa'i phyir dngos po med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: because the place is understood as related, it is not the nonexistence of the entity.

original: 'ba' zhig par rtogs pa'i rgyur yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig par rtogs pa'i rgyur yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it is not the cause of the understanding of the mere,

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin no //
translated: because of its own nature.

original: des na dngos po med pa 'ba' zhig par rtogs dgos so //
analyzed: des na dngos po med pa 'ba' zhig par rtogs dgos so //
translated: Therefore, it is necessary to understand that it is only a non-entity.

original: de bzhin dngos po'ang dngos po med par yang 'jal bar byed do zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: de bzhin dngos po'ang dngos po med par yang 'jal bar byed do zhes 'brel to //
translated: In the same way, an entity is also measured as a non-entity.

original: ci ste yang dngos po med pa 'ba' zhig mi rtogs kyi /
analyzed: ci ste yang dngos po med pa 'ba' zhig mi rtogs kyi /
translated: But if you say that it is not only a non-entity that is not understood,

original: 'on kyang dngos po med pa gzhan la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po med pa gzhan la ltos pa yin te /
translated: but rather a non-entity that depends on another,

original: dngos po 'ba' zhig kyang de bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po 'ba' zhig kyang de bzhin no zhe na /
translated: and an entity is also like that,

original: 'di la bshad pa ni de lta ni /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa ni de lta ni /
translated: the explanation of this is “If that is so,

original: min na zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: min na zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: then it is not so.”

original: / gal te dngos po med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa ni dngos po med pa ma rtogs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: / gal te dngos po med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa ni dngos po med pa ma rtogs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The commentary on the verse “If there were no non-entity” and so on is “If a non-entity were not understood” and so on.

original: ci ltar dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa ni /
analyzed: ci ltar dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa ni /
translated: The verse “How could a non-entity” and so on is

original: dngos po med pa 'ba' zhig pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa 'ba' zhig pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Even a mere non-entity” and so on.

original: de la @220b yang zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa la'o //
analyzed: de la @220b yang zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa la'o //
translated: There, “also” refers to a non-entity.

original: thug pa med par thal ba khas blangs na ni sngon med pa la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po med pa gzhan dang gzhan tshad mas ma grub po zhes bya ba sun 'byin pa yin par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal ba khas blangs na ni sngon med pa la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po med pa gzhan dang gzhan tshad mas ma grub po zhes bya ba sun 'byin pa yin par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: If you accept that there is an infinite regress, then, like the nonexistence of what has not yet occurred, etc., you should understand that the nonexistence of other things is not established by a valid cognition.

original: gal te 'ba' zhig pa las dngos po med pa gzhan ma yin pa la /
analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig pa las dngos po med pa gzhan ma yin pa la /
translated: If you say that nonexistence is not other than mere non-observation,

original: des na mngon sum nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa tshad ma gzhan med na /
analyzed: des na mngon sum nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa tshad ma gzhan med na /
translated: then, because it is the object of direct perception, nonexistence is not established by another valid cognition.

original: de lta na 'o na mi dmigs pa yang mngon sum las gzhan du dngos po med pa sgrub byed kyi tshad mar ci ltar khas len ce na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na mi dmigs pa yang mngon sum las gzhan du dngos po med pa sgrub byed kyi tshad mar ci ltar khas len ce na /
translated: In that case, how can you accept that non-observation is a valid cognition that establishes the nonexistence of something other than direct perception?

original: de nyid dran pa'i don la ltos te mi dmigs pa yin no zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid dran pa'i don la ltos te mi dmigs pa yin no zhes smos so //
translated: In response to that, it is said that non-observation depends on the object of memory.

original: ji ltar dmigs pa mi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs pa mi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is non-observation the non-observation of something?

original: ma yin par 'jug pas nus pa la sogs pa dgag par bya ba dan pa'i don la ltos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma yin par 'jug pas nus pa la sogs pa dgag par bya ba dan pa'i don la ltos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is said that it is the negation of the object of negation, such as the ability, etc.

original: des na 'dir rtogs pa de nyid ma dmigs par smras pas /
analyzed: des na 'dir rtogs pa de nyid ma dmigs par smras pas /
translated: Therefore, here, we say that that very realization is not observed.

original: kho bo cag gis mi dmigs pa dngos po med pa ltar mngon sum las tha dad pa'i tshad mar khas blangs pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis mi dmigs pa dngos po med pa ltar mngon sum las tha dad pa'i tshad mar khas blangs pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: We do not accept nonobservation to be a valid cognition that is different from direct perception, as you do when you accept nonexistence as a thing.

original: gal te gcig ni dgag pa'i gtan tshigs zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa mngon sum las tha dad par khas blangs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te gcig ni dgag pa'i gtan tshigs zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa mngon sum las tha dad par khas blangs pa ma yin nam /
translated: If you say that nonobservation is not accepted as a valid cognition that is different from direct perception because it is said that it is a reason for negation,🔽then how do you prove a negation?

original: de lta ma yin na ji ltar dgag pa 'grub ces dogs na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ji ltar dgag pa 'grub ces dogs na /
translated: We say that the proof of nonexistence

original: dngos po med pa bsgrub pa ni //🔽zhes smras te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa bsgrub pa ni // zhes smras te /
translated: is a nonobservation of a thing that is suitable to be observed.

original: dngos po med pa tha snyad sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa tha snyad sgrub pa'o //
translated: The proof of a nonthing is a nonobservation of a thing that is suitable to be observed.

original: rmongs pa la ni tha snyad la ltos te mi dmigs pa mngon sum las tha dad par khas blangs pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rmongs pa la ni tha snyad la ltos te mi dmigs pa mngon sum las tha dad par khas blangs pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement “Nonobservation is accepted as a valid cognition that is different from direct perception in relation to the conventional” is that it is accepted in relation to the conventional for the confused.

original: gal te 'ba' zhig dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum dngos po med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir mngon sum dngos po med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yin na /
translated: If the mere observation of a nonthing is the cause of the conventional term nonexistence,🔽then how do you prove a nonthing?

original: de'i tshe der med pa thams cad la dngos po med pa'i tha snyad du ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe der med pa thams cad la dngos po med pa'i tha snyad du ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: At that time, why would the term “non-existent” not apply to everything that is not present there?

original: med pa'i tha snyad ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad ni zhes smos so //
translated: [The root text] says, “The term ‘non-existent’ . . .”

original: bag chags kyi dbang gis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbang gis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Due to the power of latent propensities” means

original: don du gnyer ba la sogs pas gang du dran pa der zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don du gnyer ba la sogs pas gang du dran pa der zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that it is remembered where the object of interest, etc. is.

original: gal te ci ltar khyod kyi mi dmigs pa mngon sum las tha mi dad pa de bzhin du de kho nar bdag cag gi dngos po med pa'i tshad ma yang yin no //
analyzed: gal te ci ltar khyod kyi mi dmigs pa mngon sum las tha mi dad pa de bzhin du de kho nar bdag cag gi dngos po med pa'i tshad ma yang yin no //
translated: If you think, “Just as your non-observation is not different from perception, in the same way, for us, the valid knowledge of non-existence is also like that,”

original: shes pa de nyid ni sa phyogs la ltos nas /
analyzed: shes pa de nyid ni sa phyogs la ltos nas /
translated: that consciousness itself, in dependence on the place,

original: mngon sum yin zhing /
analyzed: mngon sum yin zhing /
translated: is perception.

original: dgag par bya ba la ltos nas med do snyam pa'i shes pa skyed pa ni /
analyzed: dgag par bya ba la ltos nas med do snyam pa'i shes pa skyed pa ni /
translated: In dependence on the object of negation, the arising of the consciousness that thinks, “It does not exist,”

original: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma yin pa'i phyir nyes pa ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tshad ma yin pa'i phyir nyes pa ci yod snyam na /
translated: is the valid knowledge of non-existence. Why is there a fault?

original: de yang snying po yod pa ma @221a * //
analyzed: de yang snying po yod pa ma @221a * //
translated: That also is not the point.

original: yin te / gang gi phyir dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i gzhal bya gzhan bkag pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: yin te / gang gi phyir dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i gzhal bya gzhan bkag pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because the object of comprehension called “non-existent” is negated,

original: bkag pa'i rnam par rtog pas kyang /
analyzed: bkag pa'i rnam par rtog pas kyang /
translated: The conceptual thought that is the negation

original: dngos po rang bzhin de nyid shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rang bzhin de nyid shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: is what makes known the nature of that entity.

original: des na byed pa lhag pa med pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan du rnam par 'jog par mi rigs so ;
analyzed: des na byed pa lhag pa med pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan du rnam par 'jog par mi rigs so ;
translated: Therefore, since there is no additional activity, it is not reasonable to posit it as a separate valid knowledge.

original: / sngon mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtags kyis rmongs pha la tha snyad lhag pa sgrub pa de la /
analyzed: / sngon mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtags kyis rmongs pha la tha snyad lhag pa sgrub pa de la /
translated: When, following the perception of something before, a reason establishes an additional property in a confused person,

original: mi dmigs pa nyid ni 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa nyid ni 'gal ba med do //
translated: nonobservation is not contradictory.

original: de ltar khas len na ni /
analyzed: de ltar khas len na ni /
translated: If one accepts that,

original: mi dmigs pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: it is nonobservation,

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not a separate valid knowledge called “nonexistence.”

original: de ltar gnod par byed ba rtag pa'i skabs las 'phros pa /
analyzed: de ltar gnod par byed ba rtag pa'i skabs las 'phros pa /
translated: Thus, the refutation of the opponent’s position is extended from the section on permanence.

original: dngos po med pa tshad ma 'am gzhal bya ma yin no zhes gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa tshad ma 'am gzhal bya ma yin no zhes gzhung btsugs pa yin no //
translated: The treatise statement, “Nonexistence is not a valid knowledge or an object of comprehension,” is established.

original: des na mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang ma gtogs par /
analyzed: des na mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang ma gtogs par /
translated: Therefore, except for the case of what is directly intended,

original: rigs mi mthun pa'i rig pa skye ba cam gnod par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i rig pa skye ba cam gnod par byed pa yin na /
translated: if the arising of a cognition of a different type is a refutation,

original: bum pa'i shes pa la yang snam bu'i shes pas gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: bum pa'i shes pa la yang snam bu'i shes pas gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: And the consciousness of a pot would be undermined by the consciousness of a woolen cloth.

original: bum pa'i shes pa la ni snam bu'i shes pa gnod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa'i shes pa la ni snam bu'i shes pa gnod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But the consciousness of a pot is not undermined by the consciousness of a woolen cloth.

original: de bzhin du sad pa'i shes pa yang rmi lam gyi shes pa'i gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sad pa'i shes pa yang rmi lam gyi shes pa'i gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the consciousness of the waking state is not undermined by the consciousness of the dream state.

original: des na sad pa'i shes pas rmi lam gyi shes pa mi gnod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na sad pa'i shes pas rmi lam gyi shes pa mi gnod pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because the consciousness of the waking state is not undermined by the consciousness of the dream state,

original: tshad mar thal ba ma spangs so //
analyzed: tshad mar thal ba ma spangs so //
translated: the absurd consequence of being a valid cognition is not avoided.

original: des na gnod pa med pa nyid ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gnod pa med pa nyid ni tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, being non-deceptive is not the definition of a valid cognition.

original: gal te re zhig tha snyad du gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i dngos po spang bar dka' la rnam pa gcig tu nges pa'i mngon sum gyis gzhan dngos po med par tha snyad byed pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa gzhan gyis ci bya /
analyzed: gal te re zhig tha snyad du gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i dngos po spang bar dka' la rnam pa gcig tu nges pa'i mngon sum gyis gzhan dngos po med par tha snyad byed pa'i phyir gnod par byed pa gzhan gyis ci bya /
translated: If, for the time being, it is difficult to avoid the fact that the object of refutation and the means of refutation are conventionally the same thing, and if a valid cognition that is ascertained in one way is conventionally said to be nonexistent by another valid cognition, then what is the use of another valid cognition that refutes it?

original: des na sad pa'i shes pa yang rnam pa gcig tu nges pa'i phyir na rmi lam gyi shes pa'i gnod byed ci ste ma yin na /
analyzed: des na sad pa'i shes pa yang rnam pa gcig tu nges pa'i phyir na rmi lam gyi shes pa'i gnod byed ci ste ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, since the consciousness of the waking state is also ascertained as a single aspect, why is it not undermined by the consciousness of a dream?

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thus, he says, “Therefore, etc.”

original: gang gi phyir rang gi rnam pa nges pa can gyi rigs mi mthun pa'i shes pa skye ba 'ba' zhig gnod par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gi rnam pa nges pa can gyi rigs mi mthun pa'i shes pa skye ba 'ba' zhig gnod par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the arising of a consciousness of a different type that is ascertained as a single aspect is the only thing that undermines it.

original: de bzhin du bzlog pa yang zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi shes pa yang sad pa'i shes pa'i gnod byed yin pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du bzlog pa yang zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi shes pa yang sad pa'i shes pa'i gnod byed yin pa'am /
translated: “In the same way, the opposite is also true” means that the consciousness of a dream would undermine the consciousness of the waking state,

original: bum pa zhes bya ba yang snam bu shes pa'i gnod byed yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa zhes bya ba yang snam bu shes pa'i gnod byed yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the consciousness of a pot would undermine the consciousness of a cloth.

original: 'ba' zhig 'dzin pas na zhes smras te /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig 'dzin pas na zhes smras te /
translated: He says, “Because it apprehends only that.”

original: sad pa'i shes pa yang 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa'i phyir gnod byed yin la /
analyzed: sad pa'i shes pa yang 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa'i phyir gnod byed yin la /
translated: Because the consciousness of the waking state also apprehends only that, it is an undermining consciousness.

original: 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa de ni @221b rmi lam dang bum pa'i shes pa la yang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa de ni @221b rmi lam dang bum pa'i shes pa la yang yod pa yin no //
translated: That apprehension of only that also exists in the consciousness of a dream and the consciousness of a pot.

original: des na 'di dag kyang gnod byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'di dag kyang gnod byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, these are also undermining consciousnesses.

original: 'di ni rigs so zhes bya ba ni 'di don dam pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di ni rigs so zhes bya ba ni 'di don dam pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the class means this is the ultimate.

original: des na gnod pa dang mi gnod pa nyid rnam par bslad pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i mtshan nyid can tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin yang rnam par bsnyad pa kho na'o snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na gnod pa dang mi gnod pa nyid rnam par bslad pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i mtshan nyid can tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin yang rnam par bsnyad pa kho na'o snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because the valid and invalid cognitions characterized by that are not adulterated by the fault of being invalidated or not invalidated, they are only to be expressed.

original: tha snyad du ni skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang gis sad pa'i shes pa nyid rmi lam gyi shes pa'i gnod par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: tha snyad du ni skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang gis sad pa'i shes pa nyid rmi lam gyi shes pa'i gnod par byed pa yin la /
translated: Conventionally, the waking consciousness is what invalidates the dream consciousness due to the power of the person's intention.

original: nya phyis mthong ba nyid dngul du mthong ba'i gnod par byed pa yin gyi bzlog par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nya phyis mthong ba nyid dngul du mthong ba'i gnod par byed pa yin gyi bzlog par ni ma yin no //
translated: The mother-of-pearl itself is what invalidates the perception of silver, not the other way around.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa'o //
translated: Therefore, etc. is the conclusion.

original: 'bras bu brjod ba ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu brjod ba ni /
translated: The result is stated:

original: de'i phyir gzhan pa dag dang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan pa dag dang zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be different from others.

original: de ltar mi slu ba nyid kun du tha snyad pa dang / don dam pa'i tshad ma dag gi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes gnas so //
analyzed: de ltar mi slu ba nyid kun du tha snyad pa dang / don dam pa'i tshad ma dag gi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes gnas so //
translated: Thus, non-deceptiveness is the general characteristic of conventional and ultimate valid cognitions.

original: 'dir phyir zlog par byed pa ni gal te bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir phyir zlog par byed pa ni gal te bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Here, the opponent’s response is “If the Bhagavān . . .” and so on.

original: don 'di yin te skyes bu'i don 'grub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: don 'di yin te skyes bu'i don 'grub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par 'dod pa yin la /
translated: The meaning of this is that because he is the cause of all the achievements of human goals, the Bhagavān is the one who is to be proven.

original: de'ang mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma nyid kyis yin te /
analyzed: de'ang mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma nyid kyis yin te /
translated: And that is done by means of valid cognitions such as direct perception.

original: ci skad du yang shes pa nga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ci skad du yang shes pa nga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: As it is said, “I am the one who knows . . .” and so on.

original: des na bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas ci bya zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas ci bya zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: So what is the point of proving the Bhagavān?

original: de ni med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrub pa'i mtha' yin no //
analyzed: de ni med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrub pa'i mtha' yin no //
translated: “ That is not so . . .” and so on is the conclusion.

original: rang dngos te rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la ni mngon sum 'jug pa yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang dngos te rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la ni mngon sum 'jug pa yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Direct perception engages in the apprehension of its own object, that is, its own characteristic.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa yin no //
translated: “Otherwise” means that inference operates in the apprehension of a universal.

original: gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa la tshad ma yin pa dang gzhan ma yin pa ni zhes bya ba ga la rtogs she na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa la tshad ma yin pa dang gzhan ma yin pa ni zhes bya ba ga la rtogs she na /
translated: How is it understood that perception and inference are valid cognitions and not others?

original: 'di yang phyi nas 'chad 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'di yang phyi nas 'chad 'gyur te //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said:

original: mngon sum gyi le'ur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi le'ur ro //
translated: In the chapter on perception.

original: skabs su bab pa la ni 'di gnyis kyi byed pa med do zhes ston pa ni re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa la ni 'di gnyis kyi byed pa med do zhes ston pa ni re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the present context, there is no operation of these two. This is shown by “For now, etc.”

original: gang gi don du bcom ldan 'das 'tshol ba 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa de ni skabs su bab pa yin la de la ni gang zhig 'jig rten pha rol rtogs par bya dgos pa'i skyes bu de'i de lta'i skad cig gzhan gyi yang gtam tsam mi
analyzed: gang gi don du bcom ldan 'das 'tshol ba 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa de ni skabs su bab pa yin la de la ni gang zhig 'jig rten pha rol rtogs par bya dgos pa'i skyes bu de'i de lta'i skad cig gzhan gyi yang gtam tsam mi
translated: The present context is that for which the Blessed One sought the world beyond, etc. In that context, if one does not know even the mere words of that person who must understand the world beyond,

original: shes na / skyes bu gzhan lta smos su yang ci zhig yod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: shes na / skyes bu gzhan lta smos su yang ci zhig yod ces bya ba ni /
translated: what need is there to mention other people?

original: tshigs su bcad @222a * //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad @222a * //
translated: This is the verse:

original: par rang dngos smos pa'i lhur bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: par rang dngos smos pa'i lhur bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the word “only” is that it is the principal object.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i spyi'i yul 'dzin par brjod pa'i lhur bya ba brjod pa ni rjes su dpag pa ni zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i spyi'i yul 'dzin par brjod pa'i lhur bya ba brjod pa ni rjes su dpag pa ni zhes pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the word “only” in the statement that inference apprehends a universal is that it is the principal object.

original: dpe dang thun mong ba'i rang bzhin du nges pa ni /
analyzed: dpe dang thun mong ba'i rang bzhin du nges pa ni /
translated: The example is the ascertainment of the nature that is common to both.

original: khyab par 'brel ba rtogs pa med pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ni gsal lo //
analyzed: khyab par 'brel ba rtogs pa med pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ni gsal lo //
translated: It is clear that the pervasion is not understood if the relation is not understood.

original: de la ni mngon sum gyi byed pa med do zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de la ni mngon sum gyi byed pa med do zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that perception does not have that as its object is taught by

original: rang gi ngo bo rig pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rig pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “the awareness of its own nature.”

original: rjes su dpag pa'i byed pa yod do zhes dogs na /🔽rjes su dpag pa de nyid kyi bsgrub bya bsgrubs nas bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi 'brel ba 'dzin pa'am /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i byed pa yod do zhes dogs na / rjes su dpag pa de nyid kyi bsgrub bya bsgrubs nas bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi 'brel ba 'dzin pa'am /
translated: If it is doubted that inference does have that as its object,🔽then there are two alternatives: either the object to be established is established by that inference, and the relation between the object to be established and the proof is apprehended,

original: de ste rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis zhes rnam par rtog pa gnyis so /
analyzed: de ste rjes su dpag pa gzhan gyis zhes rnam par rtog pa gnyis so /
translated: or else it is established by another inference.

original: // / dang po la ni ji srid rjes su dpag pa med pa de srid du khyab pa mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: // / dang po la ni ji srid rjes su dpag pa med pa de srid du khyab pa mi 'dzin la /
translated: In the first case, as long as there is no inference, the pervasion is not apprehended.

original: ji srid khyab pa ma bzung ba de srid du yang rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir phan tshun brten pa nyid du gsal lo //
analyzed: ji srid khyab pa ma bzung ba de srid du yang rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir phan tshun brten pa nyid du gsal lo //
translated: As long as the pervasion is not grasped, there is no inference, and so it is clear that there is mutual dependence.

original: gnyis pa la yang rjes su dpag pa gzhan gcig la ltos la /
analyzed: gnyis pa la yang rjes su dpag pa gzhan gcig la ltos la /
translated: In the second case, the other inference depends on another,

original: de yang gzhan gcig la ltos pa'i phyir gnyi ga yang gcig la gcig brten pa'i sgras bsdus so //
analyzed: de yang gzhan gcig la ltos pa'i phyir gnyi ga yang gcig la gcig brten pa'i sgras bsdus so //
translated: and that one depends on another, and so both are included in the term “mutual dependence.”

original: gal te 'di mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa la yang nyes pa 'di mtshungs pa yin pa de lta na yang 'jig rten pha rol smos pa ni /
analyzed: gal te 'di mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa la yang nyes pa 'di mtshungs pa yin pa de lta na yang 'jig rten pha rol smos pa ni /
translated: If this is the same fault in the inference based on perception, then the mention of the afterlife

original: skyes bu'i don mchog sgrub pa las gtsor phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu'i don mchog sgrub pa las gtsor phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is for the sake of establishing the supreme human goal.

original: bsreg pa la sogs pa sgrub pa la ni de dag gi byed pa med kyang shin tu chad pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsreg pa la sogs pa sgrub pa la ni de dag gi byed pa med kyang shin tu chad pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the case of establishing burning and so on, there is no such thing as their activity being completely severed.

original: gal te tha snyad don dam pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te tha snyad don dam pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the conventional is not the ultimate,🔽then what is the ultimate?

original: gal te de lta na rjes su dpag pa thams cad du nye bar mkho ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / skad cig ma 'dzin pa'i mngon sum yang thob par bya ba la nye bar mi mkho ba'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba don med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na rjes su dpag pa thams cad du nye bar mkho ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / skad cig ma 'dzin pa'i mngon sum yang thob par bya ba la nye bar mi mkho ba'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba don med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that, then it is pointless to say that perception and inference are valid cognitions because they are not necessary in all cases of inference and because perception that apprehends momentariness is not necessary to obtain the object.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni zhes smos so //🔽gal te tha snyad don dam pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa ni zhes smos so // gal te tha snyad don dam pa ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: He says, “Perception and inference are valid cognitions.”

original: de la brten pa'i tshad ma ci dgos nas brjod /
analyzed: de la brten pa'i tshad ma ci dgos nas brjod /
translated: If the conventional is not the ultimate, what need is there to state a valid cognition that is based on it?

original: de'i don du ni 'di nyid kyi gzhung dgos pa yang don med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i don du ni 'di nyid kyi gzhung dgos pa yang don med do zhe na /
translated: And it is pointless to state the purpose of this treatise as being for the sake of that.

original: thams cad mkhyen par sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen par sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa zhes smos so //
translated: He says, “It is in accord with the proof of omniscience.”

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this.

original: tha snyad nyid la brten te /
analyzed: tha snyad nyid la brten te /
translated: Based on the conventional,

original: khyab pa 'dzin pa sngon du btang ba'i rjes su dpag pas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa ni /
analyzed: khyab pa 'dzin pa sngon du btang ba'i rjes su dpag pas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa ni /
translated: the Bhagavān is proven by an inference that precedes the apprehension of the pervasion.

original: de'i sgo nas 'jig rten pha rol po la sogs pa nges pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas 'jig rten pha rol po la sogs pa nges pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because of that, the existence of other worlds and so on is ascertained.

original: skyes bu'i don @222b mchog grub pa'i phyir kun rdzob pa dang / don dam pa'i tshad ma gnyi ga yang brten par rigs so //
analyzed: skyes bu'i don @222b mchog grub pa'i phyir kun rdzob pa dang / don dam pa'i tshad ma gnyi ga yang brten par rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that both conventional and ultimate valid cognitions are relied upon in order to achieve the highest purpose of human life.

original: 'dir 'di dpyad de tha snyad pa'i tshad ma de zhen par byas pa'i don thob par nus pa 'am mi nus pa zhig yin /
analyzed: 'dir 'di dpyad de tha snyad pa'i tshad ma de zhen par byas pa'i don thob par nus pa 'am mi nus pa zhig yin /
translated: Here, this should be analyzed: Is that conventional valid cognition capable of attaining the object conceived by it or not?

original: nus na ni 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa la yang de nyid tshad ma yin 'dod /
analyzed: nus na ni 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa la yang de nyid tshad ma yin 'dod /
translated: If it is capable, then that very [valid cognition] is asserted to be valid regarding other worlds and so on.

original: 'dir bcom ldan 'das don du gnyer bas go ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir bcom ldan 'das don du gnyer bas go ci zhig bya ste /
translated: What is the point of pursuing the Bhagavān [in that case]?

original: thams cad du tshul gsum yongs su dag pa thun mong yin pa nyid kyis rigs mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du tshul gsum yongs su dag pa thun mong yin pa nyid kyis rigs mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because everything is of a concordant type due to the purity of the three modes being common to all.

original: 'on te mi nus na de'i cha thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub par yang mi nus pa nyid pas nges bsgrub pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nas mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs par ci ltar 'grub /
analyzed: 'on te mi nus na de'i cha thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub par yang mi nus pa nyid pas nges bsgrub pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nas mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs par ci ltar 'grub /
translated: But if [conventional valid cognition] is not capable, then omniscience is also not capable of being established in any way. Therefore, how is the attainment of high status and the definite goodness of liberation established through omniscience?

original: rjes su dpag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgrub byed yin gyi /🔽'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal ba yang yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgrub byed yin gyi / 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal ba yang yin no //
translated: All inference is a proof of omniscience,🔽but not the existence of other worlds, etc.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa ni 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa grub pa med na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa ni 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa grub pa med na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is contradictory, because the establishment of omniscience is impossible without the establishment of other worlds, etc.

original: nye bar mkho ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la yang /
analyzed: nye bar mkho ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la yang /
translated: And in the case of the omniscience that is needed,

original: srid pa gcig las gyur pa'i lam goms pas ni /
analyzed: srid pa gcig las gyur pa'i lam goms pas ni /
translated: the path that is cultivated in one lifetime

original: de srid par rjes su mi dpogs pa des na /
analyzed: de srid par rjes su mi dpogs pa des na /
translated: cannot be extended to other lifetimes.

original: 'jig rten pha rol dang bdag med pa nges pa la sogs pa la gdon mi za bar ltos dgos te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol dang bdag med pa nges pa la sogs pa la gdon mi za bar ltos dgos te /
translated: Therefore, one must certainly rely on the ascertainment of other worlds, selflessness, and so on.

original: de ltar ma yin na bsgom pa la mngon par sbyor ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na bsgom pa la mngon par sbyor ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be untenable to apply oneself to meditation.

original: des na ji srid 'jig rten pha rol ma grub pa de srid du /
analyzed: des na ji srid 'jig rten pha rol ma grub pa de srid du /
translated: Thus, as long as other worlds are not established,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa mi 'grub la /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa mi 'grub la /
translated: omniscience is not established.

original: ji srid thams cad mkhyen pa ma grub pa de srid du yang 'jig rten pha rol mi 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid thams cad mkhyen pa ma grub pa de srid du yang 'jig rten pha rol mi 'grub pa'o //
translated: As long as omniscience is not established, the existence of a future world is not established.

original: 'on te 'jig rten pha rol gyi sgras bdag ba dang sdug bsngal sgrub bar byed pa'i las kyi khyad par brjod par 'dod cing /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten pha rol gyi sgras bdag ba dang sdug bsngal sgrub bar byed pa'i las kyi khyad par brjod par 'dod cing /
translated: But if you assert that the word “future world” refers to the particular karma that is established by the self and suffering,

original: de la yang tha snyad pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rig par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la yang tha snyad pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rig par bya ba yin no //
translated: and that this is known by omniscience because conventional valid cognition does not engage it,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa yang rjes su dpag pas grub pa'i bdag med pa la sogs pa goms pa las yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa yang rjes su dpag pas grub pa'i bdag med pa la sogs pa goms pa las yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and omniscience is due to the cultivation of the selflessness that is established by inference,

original: phan tshun bsten pa nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: phan tshun bsten pa nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: then there is no error in mutual dependence.

original: de ltar na khyab par 'brel pa rtogs pa med pa la sogs pa brjod pa ci zhig dgos de ltar khyab pa rtogs pa'i blo med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de ltar na khyab par 'brel pa rtogs pa med pa la sogs pa brjod pa ci zhig dgos de ltar khyab pa rtogs pa'i blo med pa'i phyir na /
translated: In that case, what is the point of stating “without realizing the relation of pervasion” and so on? Because the mind that realizes the pervasion does not exist,

original: slar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang grub pa bkag par 'gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: slar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang grub pa bkag par 'gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: it would again be the case that omniscience is refuted.

original: skyon spong 'di'i 'bras bu ni rigs pa zhig go //
analyzed: skyon spong 'di'i 'bras bu ni rigs pa zhig go //
translated: The result of this refutation of faults is a reasoning.

original: 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni tha snyad tsam gyis grub po zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni tha snyad tsam gyis grub po zhe na /
translated: But if omniscience is established by mere convention,

original: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa @223a * //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa @223a * //
translated: then in that case,

original: grub na / des nye bar bstan pa'i lam rjes su bsgrub pas mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs par thob ba zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa yin yang /
analyzed: grub na / des nye bar bstan pa'i lam rjes su bsgrub pas mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs par thob ba zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa yin yang /
translated: since the path taught by that [omniscience] is accomplished, the meaning of attaining high status and the definite goodness is taught.

original: gal te tha snyad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa grub par brjod na de'i 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa yang /
analyzed: gal te tha snyad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa grub par brjod na de'i 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa yang /
translated: If you say that omniscience is established by convention, then the world beyond and so on would also be like that.

original: de bzhin du 'gyur ba rag mod /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gyur ba rag mod /
translated: That is certainly the case.

original: da ni tha snyad kyi sgras nye bar mkho ba med de /
analyzed: da ni tha snyad kyi sgras nye bar mkho ba med de /
translated: But now there is no need for the term “convention.”

original: nges par lags pa'i bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yang tha snyad tsam yin na /
analyzed: nges par lags pa'i bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yang tha snyad tsam yin na /
translated: If omniscience, which is the nature of definite goodness, is mere convention,

original: don dam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then since there is no other ultimate,

original: de lta na yang gal te de'i sgrub byed kun rdzob par brjod na brjod la rag ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang gal te de'i sgrub byed kun rdzob par brjod na brjod la rag ste /
translated: in that case, if you say that its proof is conventional, then that is fine.

original: rang gi bsgrub par bya ba la nus pa ni bsnyon par dka'o //
analyzed: rang gi bsgrub par bya ba la nus pa ni bsnyon par dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to deny that one is capable of accomplishing one’s own purpose.

original: de ltar yin dang nges par legs pa'i yan lag skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la rjes su dpag pa nyid mthu thogs pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar yin dang nges par legs pa'i yan lag skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la rjes su dpag pa nyid mthu thogs pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If this is so, then the power of inference with regard to the momentariness of the limbs of the path to liberation is unobstructed.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshol ba ni don med do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshol ba ni don med do //
translated: Therefore, the search for omniscience is not meaningless.

original: de'i yul ma yin pa mngon par mtho ba la ni /
analyzed: de'i yul ma yin pa mngon par mtho ba la ni /
translated: As for the higher realms, which are not the object of that [omniscience],

original: de'i nye bar bstan pa nyid 'jug byed yin na /
analyzed: de'i nye bar bstan pa nyid 'jug byed yin na /
translated: the teaching of that [omniscience] is the motivating factor.

original: nye bar bstan pa ni phyin ci log tu dogs pa dang bral bar 'bad pas bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: nye bar bstan pa ni phyin ci log tu dogs pa dang bral bar 'bad pas bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: The teaching is established through effort, free from the fear of error.

original: des na ci ltar tshad ma'i byed pa spangs nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa las skyes bu'i don thams cad grub che na /
analyzed: des na ci ltar tshad ma'i byed pa spangs nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa las skyes bu'i don thams cad grub che na /
translated: Therefore, how could the activity of valid cognition be rejected? If all human goals are accomplished through the omniscience of the Bhagavān,

original: 'di la brjod pa /🔽tshad ma med par kun mkhyen la //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa / tshad ma med par kun mkhyen la //
translated: then what is to be said about this?🔽Without valid cognition,

original: don kun 'grub min de lta na 'ang //🔽kun rdzob pa yi tshad ma ni //
analyzed: don kun 'grub min de lta na 'ang // kun rdzob pa yi tshad ma ni //
translated: all objects are not accomplished in omniscience.🔽However,🔽conventional valid cognition

original: kun mkhyen nyid dang bcas par 'dod //
analyzed: kun mkhyen nyid dang bcas par 'dod //
translated: is asserted to be possessed by omniscience.

original: 'di ltar tshad ma'i yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshad ma'i yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Thus, the object of valid knowledge is twofold:

original: gzhan dang thun mong ba 'jig rten pha rol dang / gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa bdag med pa dang / skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang thun mong ba 'jig rten pha rol dang / gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa bdag med pa dang / skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: that which is common to others, such as the world beyond, form, feeling, etc., and that which is not common to others, such as selflessness and momentariness.

original: de la dang po la ni thams cad mkhyen pa med kyang tshad ma rnyed par srid kyi /
analyzed: de la dang po la ni thams cad mkhyen pa med kyang tshad ma rnyed par srid kyi /
translated: In the first case, even without an omniscient one, it is possible to find valid knowledge.

original: gnyis pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: But not in the second case,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar bstan pa med par skad cig ma la sogs pa kun du rtogs pa skye ba mi srid pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar bstan pa med par skad cig ma la sogs pa kun du rtogs pa skye ba mi srid pa'i phyir te /
translated: because without the teaching of the Lord, the understanding of momentariness, etc. is impossible,

original: shes par 'dod pa ma skyes par de'i sgrub par byed pa la spyod pa mi 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes par 'dod pa ma skyes par de'i sgrub par byed pa la spyod pa mi 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because without the desire to know, the practice of its proof is not present.

original: dang po la ni gzugs la sogs pa nye ba la re zhig mngon sum dgag tu med la /
analyzed: dang po la ni gzugs la sogs pa nye ba la re zhig mngon sum dgag tu med la /
translated: In the first case, it is not possible to deny perception of form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang 'jig rten na grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang 'jig rten na grub pa yin no //
translated: And the convention of form, etc. is established in the world.

original: 'jig rten pha rol yang tshu rol mdzes pa ma rtogs pas /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol yang tshu rol mdzes pa ma rtogs pas /
translated: Because they do not understand that the other side of the world is more beautiful than this side,

original: brjod pa phyis shes par 'dod pas srid pas spyod pa 'jug pa rnyed @223b par sla ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa phyis shes par 'dod pas srid pas spyod pa 'jug pa rnyed @223b par sla ba'i phyir ro //
translated: they want to know about the statements later on, so they enter into the conduct of cyclic existence, because it is easy to find.

original: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa la mi 'jug ste zhes gang brjod pa de la 'jig rten pha rol gyi sgras ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa la mi 'jug ste zhes gang brjod pa de la 'jig rten pha rol gyi sgras ni /
translated: As for what was said about not entering into the other side of the world and so on, the term “other side of the world”

original: thabs dang ldan pa'i mngon par mtho ba'i cha brjod la /
analyzed: thabs dang ldan pa'i mngon par mtho ba'i cha brjod la /
translated: refers to the aspect of higher rebirth that is endowed with method.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa nges par legs pa yan lag dang bcas pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa nges par legs pa yan lag dang bcas pa gzung ngo //
translated: The term “and so on” includes the aspects of definite goodness, such as momentariness.

original: 'o na skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la yang gzhan dag gis sun dbyung ba'i don du brtags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la yang gzhan dag gis sun dbyung ba'i don du brtags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Well, if that is so, then momentariness and so on are also refuted by others, so they should be analyzed.

original: spyod pa 'jug pa bzlog tu med do zhe na de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: spyod pa 'jug pa bzlog tu med do zhe na de lta ma yin te /
translated: It is impossible to stop the entry into conduct.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung med par de dag gi sun dbyung ba'i bsam pa nyid kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung med par de dag gi sun dbyung ba'i bsam pa nyid kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not so, because without the teachings of the Bhagavat, the very thought to refute them would not arise.

original: des na rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyid sgrub par byed pa dang / sun 'byin pa brjod pa dag sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyid sgrub par byed pa dang / sun 'byin pa brjod pa dag sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the Word of the Lord, which is endowed with the distinction of nature, that is to be established, and the refutations that are stated are to be established.

original: 'on te skye ba gzhan gyi dbang gis ci zhig ltar de ltar spyod pa dang 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te skye ba gzhan gyi dbang gis ci zhig ltar de ltar spyod pa dang 'jug pa yin te /
translated: But if it is the case that one acts and engages in this way by the power of another birth,

original: 'di la ni gnod par byed pa med do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la ni gnod par byed pa med do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: then there is no harm in this.

original: de lta bu'i bka' la ma brten par ni skye ba gzhan du goms pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bka' la ma brten par ni skye ba gzhan du goms pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not so, because without relying on such a Word, there is no cultivation in another birth.

original: 'di ga las yin gal te de ltar na yang bcom ldan 'das grub pa dang / nye bar bstan pa las bdag med pa la sogs pa tshad ma rnyed na de goms pa las bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i phyir 'khor lo yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ga las yin gal te de ltar na yang bcom ldan 'das grub pa dang / nye bar bstan pa las bdag med pa la sogs pa tshad ma rnyed na de goms pa las bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i phyir 'khor lo yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is like this, then the Word of the Lord is established from the demonstration of the Lord, and if one finds a valid cognition of selflessness, etc., then the Word of the Lord is established from the cultivation of that.

original: nyes pa 'di ni med do //
analyzed: nyes pa 'di ni med do //
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: grub pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: grub pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of establishment:

original: skyes pa dang nges pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa dang nges pa'o //
translated: arising and certainty.

original: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'am da ltar ba'i nye bar bstan pa las rnam 'grel las bshad pa'i tshul du spyir bcom ldan 'das nges par gyur na nyes pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod /
analyzed: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'am da ltar ba'i nye bar bstan pa las rnam 'grel las bshad pa'i tshul du spyir bcom ldan 'das nges par gyur na nyes pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod /
translated: If the Lord is definitely established in general from the teaching of the past and present, as explained in the Pramii(laviirttikam), what sort of fault is there?

original: gal te rang gi nye bar bstan pa la sogs pa las de skye ba nyid du brjod par 'dod pa yin na ni nyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rang gi nye bar bstan pa la sogs pa las de skye ba nyid du brjod par 'dod pa yin na ni nyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If he is desirous of expressing the production of himself from his own teaching, etc., there is a fault.

original: skye ba yang brjod par 'dod pa ni yin mod kyi /
analyzed: skye ba yang brjod par 'dod pa ni yin mod kyi /
translated: But he is desirous of expressing production.

original: 'on kyang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i bcom ldan 'das gzhan nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i bcom ldan 'das gzhan nyid yin no //
translated: However, the Lord is different, having different characteristics.

original: 'on nye bar ston byed ci ltar skye zhe na /
analyzed: 'on nye bar ston byed ci ltar skye zhe na /
translated: But how is the teaching produced?

original: thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa las gzhan gyi las yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyang thog ma med pa nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa las gzhan gyi las yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyang thog ma med pa nyid do //
translated: Since the teaching of the omniscient one is the karma of another, the factors of defilement and purification are also beginningless.

original: de bzhin du bskyed par ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhan dang gzhan yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bskyed par ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhan dang gzhan yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: So too, one should understand that the other omniscient ones are generated in the same way.

original: 'o na ston par byed pa ji ltar nges she na /
analyzed: 'o na ston par byed pa ji ltar nges she na /
translated: How is the teacher ascertained?

original: gal te skyes bu'i khyad par gyi /
analyzed: gal te skyes bu'i khyad par gyi /
translated: If one seeks the nature of a person

original: rang bzhin gyi don du @224a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi don du @224a * //
translated: for the sake of the meaning,

original: gnyer na de'i tshe da ltar byung ba na gnas su mngon sum las sam /
analyzed: gnyer na de'i tshe da ltar byung ba na gnas su mngon sum las sam /
translated: then at that time, in the present, it is ascertained by direct perception.

original: 'das pa la ni gsung rab kyi mtshan nyid 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa las so //
analyzed: 'das pa la ni gsung rab kyi mtshan nyid 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa las so //
translated: In the past, it is ascertained by inference from the evidence of the result, which is the nature of the scriptures.

original: 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyi nges pa sems na de'i tshe dngos su de ma nges kyang gzhan gyi smra ba zlog par byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi tshogs kyi sgo nas yid ches su rung ba'i gsung nye bar ston pa las spyod pa rjes su dpag pa rnyed pa de tsam gyis 'dod pa grub po //
analyzed: 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyi nges pa sems na de'i tshe dngos su de ma nges kyang gzhan gyi smra ba zlog par byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi tshogs kyi sgo nas yid ches su rung ba'i gsung nye bar ston pa las spyod pa rjes su dpag pa rnyed pa de tsam gyis 'dod pa grub po //
translated: But if one considers the certainty of the qualities of the omniscient one, then even though that is not directly ascertained, one can establish the desired goal merely by inferring the conduct from the teaching of the trustworthy words that is, the collection of qualities of the miraculous powers that prevent the speech of others.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi nye bar bstan pa las nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu bsgrubs so //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi nye bar bstan pa las nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu bsgrubs so //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One has taught that the result of all-knowledge is the characteristic of definite goodness.

original: don gcig nyid yin na gnyis don med do zhes kyang gdags par mi bya ste /
analyzed: don gcig nyid yin na gnyis don med do zhes kyang gdags par mi bya ste /
translated: And it should not be said that if they have the same meaning, the two are meaningless.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni tshad ma skyes pa'i sgo nas byed ba 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni tshad ma skyes pa'i sgo nas byed ba 'jug pa yin la /
translated: The Blessed One is engaged in activity by means of valid knowledge.

original: tshad ma dag kyang de kho na nges pa'i sgo nas byed pa 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma dag kyang de kho na nges pa'i sgo nas byed pa 'jug pa yin no //
translated: And the valid knowledges are engaged in activity by means of ascertaining reality.

original: des na bcom ldan 'das ni mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i gnas lta bu yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: des na bcom ldan 'das ni mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i gnas lta bu yin par 'dod do //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One is considered to be like the eye and form, etc.

original: mngon par mtho ba yang tshad ma dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das nyid las yin te /
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba yang tshad ma dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das nyid las yin te /
translated: And the higher states also come from the Blessed One, who is endowed with valid knowledge,

original: ngag dang po ji skad brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ngag dang po ji skad brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: just as stated in the first verse.

original: 'o na ci'i don du tshad ma'i byed pa 'jug par bstan zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i don du tshad ma'i byed pa 'jug par bstan zhe na /
translated: But for what purpose is the activity of valid knowledge taught?

original: tha snyad pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to establish the conventional.

original: gnyis su med par bsgrub pa'i phyir tshad ma 'am de nyid ni tha snyad pa la ma brten pa bdag nyid gnas par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis su med par bsgrub pa'i phyir tshad ma 'am de nyid ni tha snyad pa la ma brten pa bdag nyid gnas par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: In order to establish non-duality, valid cognition or reality cannot be self-established without relying on conventional [truth].

original: de skad du yang de'i phyir lam bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rgyun la mngon pa'i nga rgyal bstan pa yin yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang de'i phyir lam bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rgyun la mngon pa'i nga rgyal bstan pa yin yang /
translated: Thus, it is explained that even though the continuum of cultivating the path and so forth is taught with manifest pride,

original: 'di thams cad tha snyad pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di thams cad tha snyad pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: all of this is conventional.

original: 'on gnyis med pa las thams cad mkhyen pa yang tha snyad nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on gnyis med pa las thams cad mkhyen pa yang tha snyad nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: However, omniscience, which is non-dual, would also be conventional,

original: rang gi ngo bo las lhag pa phra mo yang rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las lhag pa phra mo yang rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no awareness of anything subtler than its own nature.

original: 'on kyang de'i bdag por gyur pas nye bar ston par snang ba las rjes su sgrub par byed pa rnams don de dang de grub pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes pa rnam par 'jog pas na tha snyad pa nyid las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i bdag por gyur pas nye bar ston par snang ba las rjes su sgrub par byed pa rnams don de dang de grub pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes pa rnam par 'jog pas na tha snyad pa nyid las mi 'da'o //
translated: Nevertheless, since it appears to be the master of that, and since those who establish that object establish it through the appearance of that [omniscience], omniscience is posited. Therefore, it does not transcend being conventional.

original: des na gnyi ga tha snyad pa yin na thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma la ltos nas gtso bor ston par byed pa'i tshul lugs 'di ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na gnyi ga tha snyad pa yin na thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma la ltos nas gtso bor ston par byed pa'i tshul lugs 'di ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: Therefore, if both are conventional, how is this system of teaching primarily from the perspective of a valid cognition that is consistent with the establishment of omniscience?

original: bden te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir @224b dang ; sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma yang de nyid las rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir @224b dang ; sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma yang de nyid las rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is true, because omniscience itself is the object to be established, and the valid cognition that establishes it is also found in that.

original: de ltar gal te skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis mig la sogs pa yang gtso bor brjod na de'i tshe tshad ma med de /
analyzed: de ltar gal te skyes bu la nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis mig la sogs pa yang gtso bor brjod na de'i tshe tshad ma med de /
translated: If the eye, etc. are called primary because they are necessary for a person, then there is no valid cognition.

original: yul gcod pa la ltos pa'i tshad ma'i tha snyad ni /
analyzed: yul gcod pa la ltos pa'i tshad ma'i tha snyad ni /
translated: The convention of valid cognition in terms of the determination of objects

original: de dag la 'gog pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag la 'gog pa yin no //
translated: is refuted in regard to them.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin la nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis gtsor gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin la nye bar mkho ba nyid kyis gtsor gyur pa yin no //
translated: The Bhagavān is primary because of being necessary for the nature of what will arise.

original: tshad ma yang brgyud pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma yang brgyud pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: Valid cognition also benefits indirectly.

original: des na de la ltos nas bcom ldan 'das nyid gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: des na de la ltos nas bcom ldan 'das nyid gtso bo yin no //
translated: Therefore, in relation to that, the Bhagavat himself is the principal.

original: gal te de lta na skyes bu byas pa'i lung phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na skyes bu byas pa'i lung phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid yin na /
translated: If it is so, the scripture that is a human product is that which benefits.

original: ji ltar 'og tu skyes bus byas pa dang ma byas pa gnyi ga sun 'byin ci na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'og tu skyes bus byas pa dang ma byas pa gnyi ga sun 'byin ci na /
translated: How is it that below, both that which is a human product and that which is not a human product are refuted?

original: skyes bus byas pa phan 'dogs par byed pa ni /
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa phan 'dogs par byed pa ni /
translated: That which is a human product that benefits

original: bden na 'on kyang tshad mas phan btags pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bden na 'on kyang tshad mas phan btags pa yin gyi /
translated: is true, but it is benefited by valid knowledge.

original: phyi rol gyi don nges par byed pa'i tshad ma nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don nges par byed pa'i tshad ma nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by the valid knowledge itself that ascertains external objects.

original: tshad mas phan btags pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi lung nyid yin na /
analyzed: tshad mas phan btags pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi lung nyid yin na /
translated: The benefit by valid knowledge is the scripture of the Bhagavat himself.

original: nges par legs pa yan lag dang bcas pa la ni /
analyzed: nges par legs pa yan lag dang bcas pa la ni /
translated: In regard to definite goodness together with its branches,

original: dngos yin la mngon par mtho ba la ni brgyud nas yin te /
analyzed: dngos yin la mngon par mtho ba la ni brgyud nas yin te /
translated: it is direct, and in regard to high status, it is indirect,

original: de brjod pa dang 'di brjod pa skye gnas gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de brjod pa dang 'di brjod pa skye gnas gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the expression of that and the expression of this are of the same birth.

original: de ltar bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang / nges par legs pa yan lag dang bcas pa la tshad mar skyed pa'i sgo nas mtho ris dad byang grol gyi thabs la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir na bdag cag la sogs pa'i tshad ma la ltos nas /
analyzed: de ltar bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang / nges par legs pa yan lag dang bcas pa la tshad mar skyed pa'i sgo nas mtho ris dad byang grol gyi thabs la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir na bdag cag la sogs pa'i tshad ma la ltos nas /
translated: It is called useful because it is the cause of the attainment of the two aims of beings, and because it is the cause of the attainment of the two aims of oneself.

original: nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa tshad ma'i gtso bo nyid du bstan to //🔽sgrib pa med pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'di spyod yul ji tsam yin zhes bya ba ni nges par mi nus so //
analyzed: nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa tshad ma'i gtso bo nyid du bstan to // sgrib pa med pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'di spyod yul ji tsam yin zhes bya ba ni nges par mi nus so //
translated: The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.🔽The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.🔽The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.🔽The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.🔽The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.🔽The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.🔽The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.🔽The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.

original: thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la ni spyod yul la ltos pa'i bdag nyid che ba chen po yod pa'i phyir khyad par gsal lo //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la ni spyod yul la ltos pa'i bdag nyid che ba chen po yod pa'i phyir khyad par gsal lo //
translated: The word also is used to indicate that the Omniscient One is the chief valid cognition in dependence on valid cognition by us and others.

original: rig byed dang dbang phyug la sogs pa ni tshad ma gnyis las dman pa'i phyir de la ltos te bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po bsam pas ci bya snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rig byed dang dbang phyug la sogs pa ni tshad ma gnyis las dman pa'i phyir de la ltos te bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po bsam pas ci bya snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: Since the Vedas and Isvara, etc. are inferior to the two valid cognitions, what can be done by reflecting on the greatness of the Bhagavat in relation to them?

original: gal te thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs 'dod pa yin yang the tshom za ba'i phyir mi gnas pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs 'dod pa yin yang the tshom za ba'i phyir mi gnas pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Even if one accepts the position of omniscience, is it not the case that one does not abide in it because of doubt?

original: ci ltar de la ltos nas tshad ma'i spyod yul khyad par du 'phags pa gsal bar @225a * //
analyzed: ci ltar de la ltos nas tshad ma'i spyod yul khyad par du 'phags pa gsal bar @225a * //
translated: How can the object of valid cognition be clarified by distinguishing it in relation to that?

original: 'gyur / gad dag la tshad ma gnyis med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gyur / gad dag la tshad ma gnyis med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the two valid cognitions do not exist for them,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa der the tshom za ba de la ltos nas bdag nyid chen po sems pa ni shin tu dad pa che'o zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa der the tshom za ba de la ltos nas bdag nyid chen po sems pa ni shin tu dad pa che'o zhe na /
translated: it is extremely faithful to reflect on the greatness of the self in relation to that doubt about omniscience.

original: bden te 'di lta bu'i brjod pa ni srid pa la bsam pa yin te /
analyzed: bden te 'di lta bu'i brjod pa ni srid pa la bsam pa yin te /
translated: It is true, but such an expression is intended for those who exist.

original: gal te tshogs pa'i khyad par las de 'dra ba skyes par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa'i khyad par las de 'dra ba skyes par 'gyur na /
translated: If it were to arise from the specific collection of causes,

original: de'i tshe tshad ma gnyis ma zhugs pas nges pa med kyang gnod byed med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe tshad ma gnyis ma zhugs pas nges pa med kyang gnod byed med pa'i phyir /
translated: At that time, although there is no certainty because the two valid cognitions do not engage, there is no refutation.

original: de'i bdag nyid chen po gang gis bzlog snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid chen po gang gis bzlog snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, by what great essence of it is it to be refuted?

original: gnod byed med pa yang mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnod byed med pa yang mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The absence of refutation will be explained later.

original: rig byed lnga sogs pa mngon sum la ltos nas dman pa de nyid ston par 'dod pas /
analyzed: rig byed lnga sogs pa mngon sum la ltos nas dman pa de nyid ston par 'dod pas /
translated: The five types of Vedic knowledge and so on are inferior in dependence on direct perception.

original: bsam pa 'dis bya ba'i skabs ston pa na /
analyzed: bsam pa 'dis bya ba'i skabs ston pa na /
translated: With this intention, when the context of action is taught,

original: phyogs snga ma dgod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs snga ma dgod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: the opponent's position is stated with If... and so on.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'i mngon sum gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba'i mngon sum gyi'o //
